Package it.polimi.se2019.server.actions.conditions

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Condition
    The Condition interface gives a common method for all different conditions to be met by a card before activating its effect.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanShoot
    The CanShoot class extends the ExecutedActionUnits condition class.
    DifferentTargetsInList
    This condition checks whether the target selected by the attacker are all different.
    DifferentTargetsInListTest  
    Distance
    This condition checks whether the distance between the attacker and the target tile is exactly the same as the member variable amount.
    DistanceTest  
    ExecutedActionUnits
    The ExecutedActionUnits condition class checks whether an action unit has been performed.
    ExecutedActionUnitsTest  
    HasAmmo
    This condition checks whether the attacker has enough ammo.
    HasAmmoTest  
    HasTargetedAmmo
    The HasTargetedAmmo condition class checks the availability of a particular ammo color.
    HaveTargetsAtDistance
    The HaveTargetsAtDistance condition class checks the presence of any targets at a certain distance.
    IsAttackerTile
    This condition checks whether the selected tile is the same as the attacker's tile.
    IsAttackerTileTest  
    IsNotAttackerTile
    This condition checks whether the selected tile is not the same as the attacker's tile.
    IsRoomVisible
    This condition checks whether a room is visible from the current player's position.
    IsRoomVisibleTest  
    IsTargetInActionUnitTargetList
    This condition checks whether a target was selected in a previous action unit.
    IsTargetInActionUnitTargetListTest  
    IsTargetInDamageTargetList
    This condition checks whether the player target is present in the cumulative damage target set, which contains players who received damage in a single shoot.
    IsTargetInDamageTargetListTest  
    IsTargetInTargetList
    This condition checks whether a player target is in the target list.
    IsTargetInTargetListTest  
    IsTargetListInDirection
    This condition checks whether the target list is in the chosen direction.
    IsTargetListInDirectionTest  
    IsTargetListNotVisible
    This condition checks whether the target list is not visible.
    IsTargetListVisible
    This condition checks whether the target list is visible.
    IsTargetListVisibleTest  
    IsTargetNotInActionUnitTargetList
    This condition checks whether a target was selected in a previous action unit.
    IsTargetNotInActionUnitTargetListTest  
    IsTargetNotInDamageTargetList
    This condition checks whether the target was not in the damage target list of a shoot action.
    IsTargetNotInTargetList
    This condition checks whether a player target is not in the target list.
    IsTargetNotInTargetListTest  
    IsTileListVisible
    This condition checks whether the list of tiles is visible.
    IsUnidirectional
    This condition checks whether the tiles or targets that were selected are in one direction.
    MaxDistance
    This condition checks whether the distance between the attacker and the target tile is less than the amount member variable.
    MaxDistanceTest  
    MinDistance
    This condition checks whether the distance between the attacker and the target tile is greater than the amount member variable.
    MinDistanceTest  
    OneDirectionMovement
    This condition checks whether the movement was unidirectional.
    OneDirectionMovementTest  
    OneTileOneTarget
    This condition checks whether the selected player targets corresponds to each one of the different selected tiles.
    PlayerNotInRoom
    This condition checks whether the attacker is not in the selected room.
    PlayerNotInRoomTest  
    TargetListOnDifferentTiles
    This condition checks whether the selected targets' positions are all different.
    TargetListOnDifferentTilesTest
